sentence:
…turned 75 on July 13th.

Mr. Payne was born on July 13, 1950, and has devoted almost 50 years  to serving his community and country, becoming a historic figure in the  City of Opelika and a respected voice among Alabama veterans and civic  leaders. In 2016, he made history as the first African American elected  Chairman of the City of Opelika Board of Zoning…

Mr. ROGERS of Alabama. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize the  retirement of Gary Fuller, Mayor of the City of Opelika, Alabama.

Mayor Fuller has tirelessly served the City of Opelika for over 20  years. He served on the City Council from 2000 to 2004 and was first  elected Mayor August 24,…
